.. _database-tables-config:

======
Config
======

This table contains the configuration information for the given simulation.

.. list-table:: 
    :header-rows: 1

    * -  Column
      -  Description
    * -  configId
      -  The numeric identifier for the particular configuration entry.
    * -  Session_sessionId
      -  The simulation run session Id.
    * -  paramName
      -  Fully qualified parameter name from the configuration.
    * -  paramValue
      -  Value of the parameter.
